resources.string: 1. The clock resets to 00:00:00 when you click on New Game. Tally resets to 25.
2. When you click Start, the stop watch starts ticking. It pauses when you click Stop and resumes when you click Start again.
3. Whenever you Stop the Clock, the Tally gets updated.

4. When you stop, if the last 2 digits( milliseconds) are a multiple of 25, your Tally gets increased by that multiplier. If the last two digits are 00, your Tally gets increased by 4. Otherwise, your Tally will be decreased by the number you are off from the closest multiplier of 25.
5. Score gets incremented by 1 each time you Stop without making the tally 0. The game ends when your Tally reaches 0.
